mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_notice order by not_num desc ) a ) where not_hot = 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice (not_num, not_title, not_content, not_writer) values (seq_notice_num.nextval, #{not_title}, #{not_content}, #{not_writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set not_title = #{not_title}, not_content = #{not_content}, not_hot = 1 where not_num = #{not_num}
